name: Sincerely, Mr. S
description:
Deliver messages in a bottle and find out who and why they are sending them.

Made from Jan 16th to Jan 21st 2022 for Godot Wild Jam #41. 

Programming:

- Jerome M St.Martin

- Jacob Nasrallah

Art, Audio, and Story Production:

- Nikki Tjoa

- Vivian Edwards

Main Soundtrack by 'Wolfgang':

https://opengameart.org/content/ocean-theme
